Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 43rd overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Gary Reith (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2015, off Christopher Engstrom (NY)...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/3/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2015, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2016, hitting .478 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 4/26/2017 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2018, hitting .517 with 0 HR, 2 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/7/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $4,750,500 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Francisco on 9/6/2019...
Injured on 9/11/2019 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Injured on 5/16/2020 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Injured on 6/8/2021 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 2/3/2022 (Going to DET: 3B Edward Clinard, 3B Cedrick Fernandez, P Deangelo Montejano, CF Andrew Ruggles, P Thurman Brawley. Going to CIN: P Rodney Schloss)...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 9/25/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/2/2023 to a 4-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
